name: CrowdThnk
main_data_source: Data Aggregator, Public Data, Survey, Web Data
pricing_structure: Includes API data access, downloadable csv & excel files, research reports, monthly consultation
why_us?: Actionable and reliable measurements of market positioning on individual stocks
advantages: A unique approach of measuring market positioning data. The Founders have extensive experience in the Hedge Fund and Big Data Industries, creating successful alpha-generating strategies using predictive analytics.
use_cases: Netflix exhibited an oversubscribed CrowdThnk Positioning Score ahead of July 2018 earnings announcement. Clients hedged and adjusted portfolio by being cognizant of extended positioning and skewed risk-reward into the event. Stock drops over -10% on missed earnings.
